1.0.0.name: wordpress/99-facebox-download
1.0.0.description:
Facebox is a jQuery-based, Facebook-style lightbox which can display images, divs, or entire remote pages. It's simple to use and easy on the eyes. This plugin makes Facebox installation a breeze. Inspired by Daniel Stockman's Facebox v1.2.2, 使用方法: [idl id="自定义值" t="要显示的链接文字"] 下载链接列表 [/idl]. 或是图片弹窗[idl img="file.jpg"]图片地址[/idl]. .

Related Links: Plugin Homepage, Facebox

This release has been tested compatible with all WordPress versions since 3.0

Please submit feedback to the plugin's home page in regards to features you would like to see in the future.
